title: Jeni's Splendid Ice Cream Deserts - Jeni Britton Bauer
description:
In JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Splendid Ice Cream Desserts, ice creams deliciously melt into hot brown Bettys, berry cobblers, sweet empanadas, and corn fritters. Her one-of-a-kind cakes and cookies are not only served with ice cream, they get crumbled on top and incorporated into the ice cream base itself.

Sundae combinations dazzle with bold and inspired sauces, such as Whiskey Caramel and Honey Spiked with Chilies. And JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s crunchy Ã¢â‚¬Å“gravelsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (crumbly sundae toppings)Ã¢â‚¬â€such as Salty Graham Gravel and Everything Bagel GravelÃ¢â‚¬â€are unlike toppings anyone has ever seen before.

Store-bought ice cream can be used for all the desserts in the book, but it will be hard to resist JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s breakthrough recipes for dairy-free ice cream, frozen custard, and soft-serve. Thirty brand-new flavors, including Cumin & Honey Butterscotch and Extra-Strength Root Beer Ice Cream, attest to the magic of this unique and alluring collection.

ABOUT THE AUTHOR
 
Jeni Britton Bauer started making ice cream in 1996 and now perfects her crafts at JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Splendid Ice Creams. She has a growing number of stores (15 and counting) in and out of Ohio, more than 1,000 retail partners throughout the country, and a thriving mail-order business. Devotees nationwide scan JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s website and social media feeds daily, causing a veritable run on new flavors. Her debut cookbook, JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Splendid Ice Creams at Home, is a New York Times and Wall Street Journal bestseller and winner of the 2012 James Beard Award for best book in the dessert category. The book appeared on Good Morning America and NPRÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s The Splendid Table, and in USA Today, The Wall Street Journal, The Washington Post, Food & Wine, Better Homes & Gardens, Elle Decor, and more. Her latest cookbook is Jeni's Splendid Ice Cream Desserts.
